snippet.title: Meridian 157: Chapter 2 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Official trailer for Meridian 157: Chapter 2, available on iOS, Android, Amazon and Steam

Available on:
-iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/meridian-157-chapter-2/id1512282997
-Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gmail.novasoftinteractive.Meridian_157_Chapter_2&hl=en_CA&gl=US
-Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1458930/Meridian_157_Chapter_2/
-Amazon app store: https://www.amazon.ca/NovaSoft-Interactive-Ltd-Meridian-157/dp/B08966BRQC/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=meridian+157+chapter+2&qid=1606421474&s=mobile-apps&sr=1-1
